system.description:
The most powerful of witches, who gain potency by channeling gods just as with any other shaman, but also by gaining personal power through eating livers of humans, wherein they gain enough Gahom, personal spiritual power, to energize their most powerful of sorceries: shapeshifting, flight, fire-summoning, and bisection. To harness this much Gahom, they must have a vessel, which is an item known as the Itim Na Sisiw, or Black Raptorling. When an Uswang relinquishes their Itim Na Sisiw, they die. While they have the Itim Na Sisiw, they are functionally immortal.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter with 4 Kadungganan. Check the book for higher ranks.)

traits.name: Poise
traits.description: Whenever a Chief suffers a Status Effect or is forcibly moved, they can choose to ignore it and gain a Poise Token instead. When they gain 5 Poise Tokens, they become Poise Broken: they can suffer all Status Effects, can be forcibly moved as normal, and cannot gain any more Poise Tokens. While Poise Broken, a Chief loses 1 Poise Token whenever they start their riff. When they lose all Poise Tokens, they lose Poise Broken and can again gain Poise Tokens.

traits.name: Dragon Eye
traits.description: Chiefs can riff a number of times per Resound equal to the Kadungganan.

traits.name: Tanggal
traits.description: When the Uswang rushes, they fly for the movement.

traits.name: Illusion
traits.description: Attacks against debilitated, bleeding, and confused fighters inflict +1d.

traits.name: Wicked Argent Witch
traits.description: The Uswang has Evade against melee attacks.

system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Spirit Needle. Attack all enemies in an area (line 6) with Faith. 50% chance of bleeding.

Gambit [[/r d6]]

Phase 1: Witch

1-3: Rush > Inflict Violence > Gabii Nawng [1]: Gain Stealth.

4-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Hex [1]: Slide 2 all chosen fighters in burst 4.

Phase 2: Ghoul. Trigger automatically when Staggered.

1-2: Rush > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

3-4: Rush > Inflict Violence > Hex [1]: Slide 2 all chosen fighters in burst 4.

5: Dog Form [1]: Rush double Speed, slow all enemies moved through > Inflict Violence > Rakshasa Hex [1]: Debilitate, Confuse, and Bleed all enemies in range 3 burst 1.

6: Great Barang [3]: Inflict 1 True Hit on all enemies in the battlefield, stun them, and poison them.
